HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Proizvodi se šalju u roku od 2 do 3 radna dana i dostavljaju u roku 1-2 radna dana od slanja.
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Za otoke i manja mjesta, pošiljke se dostavljaju prema rasporedu GLS-a.
HOME_DELIVERY.cod_surcharge: Kurir nudi plaćanje pouzećem kao dodatnu uslugu te se stoga i dodatno naplaćuje.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing:
GLS paketomat: 2,50€ (BESPLATNO za narudžbe iznad 45€)
BOX NOW paketomat: 2€ (BESPLATNO za narudžbe iznad 45€)

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The website offers standard home delivery and parcel locker delivery within Croatia. In-store pickup, parcel shops, and bulky item delivery are not available.
PROVIDERS: Home delivery is handled by GLS. Parcel locker delivery is available via GLS and BOX NOW.
PRICING: Standard home delivery costs €4.90. GLS parcel locker delivery is €2.50, and BOX NOW parcel locker delivery is €2.00. All delivery methods are free for orders over €45.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Delivery to Croatian islands is available but follows a specific GLS schedule; no extra surcharge is mentioned. Cash on Delivery (COD) is an option for home delivery but comes with an unspecified additional fee. Deliveries are made on weekdays (Monday-Friday) only. No express delivery options are offered.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is located on a clear and dedicated 'Plaćanje i dostava' page. It effectively outlines the available services, providers, and costs. The only significant missing detail is the exact cost of the COD surcharge.
